text: 🚨 New Report: The High Cost of Healthcare in America 💸🤕Average American can only afford $97/month for medical costs! 😱 Preventive care, prescription drugs, mental health, and diagnostic testing are being skipped or delayed. 🙅‍♂️ It's time for a change! 💪PayZen is tackling healthcare affordability with AI-powered solutions. 💻 We're on a mission to enhance patient satisfaction and improve financial outcomes for healthcare providers. 🏥 Join us in the fight for accessible, affordable healthcare! 💪🏼
